price: Sema: Mola wetu Mlezi atatukusanya, kisha atatuhukumu kwa haki; na Yeye ndiye Hakimu Mwenye kujua.
arabic: قُلۡ يَجۡمَعُ بَيۡنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُمَّ يَفۡتَحُ بَيۡنَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُوَ ٱلۡفَتَّاحُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
footnotes: Waambie: Mola wetu Mlezi atatukusanya Siku ya Kiyama, kisha atatuhukumu kwa haki. Na Yeye Subhanahu ndiye Hakimu wa kila shauri, Mwenye kujua kwa hakika yetu sisi na yenu nyinyi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul yajmaʿu baynanā rabbunā thumma yaftaḥu baynanā bil-ḥaqi wahuwa al-fatāḥu al-ʿalīmu
